name: Roast Royale
description:
Roast Royale

How many times do you get the family together for a classic Sunday Roast to be instantly reminded of the betrayal from a sibling that took the last roast potato away from you at the previous gathering? Well now it is time to get your revenge! Compete in a 4 player, free for all battle to gather your preferred meal plan before your other family members do. With the powers to pick up your desired food, or slap your opponents to make them drop theirs, this fast paced party game will lead to chaos as you all race to make the best meal.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2019 so it isn't the most polished but we would like to come back with more updates in the future.

How To Play

The current build requires 3 Xbox 360 controllers and a keyboard to play. Once all of these controllers are connected, press the pause button on any controller to start.

  • Xbox controls - lefts stick to move, "X" to grab, "B" to slap and "start" to pause
  • Keyboard controls - "WASD" to move, "E" to grab, "F" to slap and "space" to pause
